TI: [Participation of the hippocampus in delayed spatial choice and discrimination of time intervals in rhesus macaques].
AB: Participation of the hippocampus in morpho-functional systems of delayed spatial choice and differentiation of trace reflexes to time was shown in 2 macaco rhesus by the method of phase-correlational analysis. Application of 0.05 per cent solution of amysyl into the hippocampus disturbed the behaviour of monkeys, probably, as a result of desintegration of entire morpho-functional system regulating spatial-temporal sequence of nervous processes of delayed behavioural act.
TT: Uchastie gippokampa v otsrochennom prostranstvennom vybore i differentsirovanii vremennykh intervalov u makak rezusov.
TA: Zh Vyssh Nerv Deiat Im I P Pavlova
JT: Zhurnal vysshei nervnoi deiatelnosti imeni I P Pavlova
SO: Zh Vyssh Nerv Deiat Im I P Pavlova. 1984 Jan-Feb;34(1):48-52.
